message.content:
cs.DC, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper focuses on distributed storage systems and their performance analysis, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The use of erasure codes for data encoding and retrieval is a key aspect of the proposed model, which is a topic of interest in information theory. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The queuing theoretic analysis of the proposed model involves the study of system dynamics and control, which is a relevant area of research in this sub-category. 
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The performance of cloud storage systems is closely related to network and internet architecture, making this sub-category a possible fit. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper discusses scheduling policies for data retrieval, which is a topic of interest in data structures and algorithms.
